website_summaries.verdict: A simple modern design with tempered glass supports.
pros: This gorgeous glass table works as well as a decorative piece as it does a desk
A straightforward, elegant piece measuring 44 inches wide by 16 inches deep by 32 inches high
cons: Assembly is difficult, and the wood surface is easily dented

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. well made and easy to assemble. However, Make sure you put the plastic washers on both sides of the glass. The only problem I had was a simple solution. They mixed up the numbers in the assembly diagram for the longer bolts. They obviously are for the glass sides, so it was an easy fix by switching to the short bolts. Not a problem enough to ding a star for it. We even stole the idea of matching flower arrangement with a Picture to match in our entry.
customer_reviews.author: James Marino

customer_reviews.title: Great hallway table!
customer_reviews.text: This table certainly turned out how it looks in the photos. Assembly was easy and only took a couple of minutes. I purchased this table for a hallway and it does the job perfectly. My only concern about this table is that it's not very sturdy if you touch it/bump into it from an angle. It wont break, but it certainly feels flimsy sometimes. Considering I used it as a decorative hallway table, sturdiness isn't much of a concern, but I do want to express that one concern. Would not recommend this table if you are wanting to actively use it, but for decoration, absolutely! I enjoy it and I've received many compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Panchevre

customer_reviews.title: Great piece, good color gray!
customer_reviews.text: Great piece for the price, color looks great, easy to put together and very sturdy! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Razberriez

customer_reviews.title: Great Piece of Furniture!
customer_reviews.text: this is a good quality table. it works perfectly for the purpose we purchased it for. it's heavy, which is a good thing, no worries about it toppling. other's reviews were extremely helpful, such as the instructions being incorrect for the screws...simply switched the top screws for the side screws. also had the vacuum ready to clean up the packing styrofoam bits that stuck to things and wanted to scatter. very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: The photo doesn't do it justice. For a mail in a box piece of furniture, this is a great piece. No damage at all upon arrival. The glass is sturdy and...clear. The "wood" pieces hold up well and look solid from a distance. I knocked off a star because my package arrived with no hardware and it took near a month to get the hardware sent from the mfg. still, even so - now that it's put together and the frustration is behind me - I can say it's definitely worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: caribella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Sturdy. Glass on the sides make it ideal for putting something underneath it. We use it just inside the front door and put a shoe rack underneath. Can't' complain at all. Easy to assemble as well.
customer_reviews.author: Esper

customer_reviews.title: Used this as a TV stand
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, the whole set looks great. I used this one for a TV stand that was tall enough to keep my 19 month old from grabbing the TV. It is exactly the right size for a 50in LED and has no problem with the weight, might even handle an older Plasma, it's a strong table.
customer_reviews.author: JT E

customer_reviews.title: It's so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful table and fully worth the price. It just so happens to match my bedroom set which was a plus so I turned it into my vanity table. Easy to put together. Yes two people are highly recommended. **TIP: dont forget to remove the clear sticker on the legs first. This is to possibly avoid having to dismantle to remove it. looking for a stool now to go with and I'm all set. So glad I purchased!!!
customer_reviews.author: JLaw

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This table is perfect! I love the height because I am using it as an entryway table. I got the grey color because I will soon be painting. This is a high quality table. Packaged well and easy to put together (may take two people because the glass is a little heavy). I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table.
customer_reviews.text: Came carefully packed, was a bit more difficult to put together than I anticipated, but well worth the effort. I chose the concrete-look table, and it really looks beautiful in my bedroom, modern, yet understated. Have received a number of compliments, and am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: John from Va.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the whole set. Love it. Not the most easy or fun putting it together though.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to assemble and the quality is very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to assemble and the quality is very nice. Assembly took me 10 mins. I'm using it in my guest room for a small tv and dvr. It can also be used as a desk, decorative table, or entry table. It has many uses and I will be using it for a variety of purposes, depending on the room. GREAT!
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice table. Easy to put together. I did it myself, but would recommend 2 people because of the weight.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Placed this in my dining room in lieu of a buffet. Looks wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and solid for the price. Instructions are horrible but common sense will tell you they switched the screw sizes. Pretty easy to put together too. Be careful with the "wood" during assembly. The veneer can peel. But it's definitely great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel789

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for entryway
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this table in my home, it’s sturdy and beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Kali C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Comptempary and sleek for small spaces. Easy to assemble. Concrete look is a laminate .
customer_reviews.author: AllieBoBallie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful in my facial studio
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in my facial studio. So well made, and it does take 2 people to put it together because of the heavy sides.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Olson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Looks modern, expensive, and is exactly what I needed! Makes a perfect vanity with the LED mirror (also ordered on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: I love it with my darkwood bedroom furniture
customer_reviews.text: I use this table console as a tv stand. I love it with my darkwood bedroom furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: the glass was broken in many pieces like an explotion
customer_reviews.text: you must be more careful next time because the glass came broken and the box opened and my son got hurt when he picked up the box
customer_reviews.author: belkis t.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice table but come a little bit scratch for the side
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It look good I am very happy . Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous table it was easy to set up it took like about 30 mins
customer_reviews.author: Betty Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect in my living room. I use it to hold my 42inch TV and swivel.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: table replaced a wide table for old tube TV. Already had the slim LED TV, big difference, 2/5 the size.
customer_reviews.author: Four!

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece! Slightly wobbly
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece! Slightly wobbly, when picked up, but looks nice and modern in our bedroom. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It look so pretty!! I like it so much!! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product easy to put together and looks very expensive
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with item
customer_reviews.text: The table top came damaged and the glass top was chipped. This may have happened in shipping, but the screws do not fit the holes for the back piece. I will just return to whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: BONITA FIELDS

customer_reviews.title: Modern and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Very modern and sleek. Easy to assemble. I get so many compliments on this by my customers. Perfect as a standing writing table.
customer_reviews.author: A.Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This looks really cool! Picture does not capture the coolness.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love love love, but losens and becomes wiggly over the days. I find myself tightening the screws at least once a month.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: First time the item arrived damaged but
customer_reviews.text: I immeditaley asked for a replacement. They quickly complied and sent me another. The second one arrived in one piece. It is beautiful and sturdy! It was exactly what I was looking for,.
customer_reviews.author: Monsey Tejada

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking table, it took me and my 80 years old father 40 min to put it together.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used to make a small gaming setup and it turned out pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Krssumday

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great quality and really easy to build :D
customer_reviews.author: Paige C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! I get a ton of compliments on this table. Very sturdy and looks very expensive!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great Behind ny Couch! Just what I waslooking for. Thanks!

customer_reviews.title: Looks and functions great!
customer_reviews.text: I used as a barstool table. Looks and functions great!

product_meta.title: Monarch specialties , Console Sofa Table, Tempered Glass, Cappuccino, 44"L
product_meta.description: Color:Cappuccino| Size:44"LEnhance the look of your home with this rich cappuccino, hollow-core sofa table with thick and sturdy tempered glass sides. Use this multi-functional table to showcase your treasured decorative items or simply as an accent piece against any wall of your home.
feature_bullets: Adds a modern polished look to any room
Can be used as a hall or sofa console table
Ample surface area to showcase your favorite pieces
